name: Tile Tap (fridays1881)
description:
In this tile based rpg you play as a night surviving in a world where every time you sleep you wake up in a new land.

The controls are, wasd/arrow keys to move, m to open crafting menu/inventory, esc to close crafting menu/inventory, p to sleep, 9 to access zoomed in mode, 7 and 8 to control volume, and if there are any questions on how to play msg me at fridays18#4002

Please note that this game is in early dev and im looking for any recommendations!
